testcase.name: Verify various scenarios
testcase.system-out: Given that the user has navigated to the Web Application URL................passed When title of the page is titled Where Experiences are Engineered - Valtech.passed Then the section at the bottom called Latest News should be displayed.......passed Then user clicks on the About link and verifies that the H1 tag is displayed.passed Then the user clicks on the Services link and verifies that the H1 tag is displayed.passed Then the user clicks on Work link and verifies that the H1 tag is displayed.passed Then then user clicks on the About link.....................................passed Then the user goes to the contact page and verifies the total location count.passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
